name: The Fourth Sarcophagus
overview: A simple text adventure, with the usual 2 word input that characterizes the early attempts to put the world into something other than graphics. Very difficult to start off, and the parser isn't very wide ranging either. But that's what happens when you try to cram something like this into just 8K or 16K. the adventure takes place in the land of Hebryptia and you must at least find the pyramid where the secret is buried.
